name: Starfighter Galaxy Defender VR
summary:
Use your virtual reality headset to experience the thrill of navigating a space fighter from the comfort of your own home! Get ready to pilot a galaxy fighter in virtual reality. Look in the direction you want the fighter to fly, pull the trigger to shoot the laser gun, and don't run into any obstacles. Fight your way through the asteroid field and get to the checkpoint on the other side.

This game is for 3D mobile virtual reality headsets. To MOVE just turn your headset in the direction you want to go and maneuver through obstacles to get to the checkpoint. To FIRE use any input to activate shooting from side lasers. Press the X option in the top left corner to play in normal mode or the VR onscreen icon the play in VR mode.
